title: Jodi Nilave Lyrics Thanga Magan Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Thanga Magan Jodi Nilave Song Lyrics
English Meaning
The Pain of Tamizh
Singer: Dhanush, Shweta Mohan
Lyrics: Dhanush

Lyrics in Thanglish
Exact translation of tamil words
Jodi Nilave
paadhi uyirae
sogam yenadaa ?

thaembum manadhai
thaangum  madiyil
saaindhu kolladaa.

Kaalam kadandhu pogum
undhan kaayam
pazhagi pogum.

Mannil vilundha poovum
siru kaatril parakka koodum.

thaanga thaanga baarangal
kaalam thandhavai.
kaanavendum aayiram
kodi punnagai.

thaangi kol en kanmani
saindhukol en thozhil nee

vaanam boomi kaattrai thaandi
vazhndhu paarakalaam.

Jodi Nilave
paadhi uyirae
sogam yenadaa ?

thaembum manadhai
thaangum  madiyil
saaindhu kolladaa.

Kaayam kadandhu pogum
undhan kaadhal
pazhagi pogum.

Mannil vilundha poovum
siru kaatril parakka koodum.		 English Meaning
I tried my best :)
my love pair
my half life
why sadness ?

rest your
sobbing heart
on my caring lap.

time will go away,
you’ll get used
to the pain.

a fallen flower,
may fly in the air

all the bearing burdens,
was given by time.
we’ve to see
thousands of smile.

just bear my beloved
just lean on my shoulder

we should live
a beautiful life

my love pair
my half life
why sadness ?

rest your
sobbing heart
on my caring lap.

time will go away,
